content: **this is a listing for a printable pattern in pdf form not the actual item*** this easy crochet mop cover uses the crunch stitch for a detailed yet simple texture perfect for cleaning finished product measure 10 inches long and 5 inches wide materials - 130 yards of cotton yarn - scissors - tapestry needle to weave in ends - stitch markers optional they can come in handy to keep row even us abbreviations chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet gauge 22 row should be a 5 x 5 square adjust your hook size accordingly if your sample swatch is a different size this pattern and more are available on my blog as free patterns this listing is for an ad-free and printable version thank you for visiting
